A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a film with a heart of gold and presents its audience with hope in the face of the various failures its characters face. Its beautifully shot and the dynamic between Daisy Ridley's Rey and Adam Driver's Kylo Ren is mesmerising. And this Star Wars film has perhaps the best space battles I have seen so far from this franchise\, as well as a truly unique lightsaber battle.
